author: ljuckett
body: Adds Delta Phi histograms to IT/OT Cluster, RecHit, and TrackingRecHit validation. Histograms are split by module type. Summary histograms for the endcaps and barrel will be used in the DQMGUI for release validation. The Phase-2 DQM code runs without errors and produces the expected histograms. Example histogram:
title: Phase 2 Tracker: Summary histograms for release validation
